original_title: THE BLACK MAGES LIVE "Above the Sky"
overview: For their second album, The Black Mages performed two promotional concerts. They performed all the songs from their second album, along with "The Decisive Battle", "Those Who Fight Further" and "Clash on the Big Bridge" from their first album. This DVD contains the recording of the first concert in the tour.
title: THE BLACK MAGES LIVE "Above the Sky"
